original_text: And when he had entered the house and left the people, his disciples asked him about the parable.
korean_text: 무리를 떠나 집으로 들어가시니 제자들이 그 비유를 묻자온대

sentences.original_text: And when he had entered the house,
his disciples asked him about the parable.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제자들이 그에게 비유에 대해 물었습니다.
